title: Establishes a second office of judge of the county court in the county of Chenango
summary: Establishes a second office of judge of the county court in the county of Chenango; provides for such judgeship to be filled at the general election to be held in November 2, 2011.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1529

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 10, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CROUCH, FINCH, P. LOPEZ -- read once and referred
         to the Committee on Judiciary

       AN  ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to establishing a second
         county court judgeship in the county of Chenango

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 8 of section 182 of the judiciary law, as added
    2  by chapter 699 of the laws of 1969, is amended to read as follows:
    3    8. Chenango, [one] TWO;
    4    S  2.  A  new  office  of  judge  of the county court of the county of
    5  Chenango is hereby established. Each county court judge in the county of
    6  Chenango, in  office  or  hereafter  elected,  shall  also  act  as  and
    7  discharge  the  duties  of county court judge, judge of the family court
    8  and surrogate of such county.
    9    S 3. This act shall take effect January 1,  2012;  provided,  however,
   10  that  the  additional  office  of county court judge created pursuant to
   11  this act shall first be filled at the general election  to  be  held  on
   12  November 8, 2011.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04549-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to establishing a second county court judgeship in the county of Chenango
